item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "Ladies know what to guard against, because they read novels that tell them of these tricksâ€¦" -- Thomas Hardy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "A strong woman who recklessly throws away her strength, she is worse than a weak woman who has never had any strength to throw away." -- Thomas Hardy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "Beauty lay not in the thing, but in what the thing symbolized." -- Thomas Hardy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "If an offense come out of the truth, better is it that the offense come than that the truth be concealed." -- Thomas Hardy

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Thomas Hardy
item.description: "Their position was perhaps the happiest of all positions in the social scale, being above the line at which neediness ends, and below the line at which the convenances begin to cramp natural feeling, and the stress of threadbare modishness makes too little of enough." -- Thomas Hardy
